channel.title: Fix the status page!
channel.description: somene serously fix the god damn server status page! i've been trying to post it for the past 7 days! and my servers on vps..

item.title: Fix the status page!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

boby1:

alright how soon do you think it will be fixed.

I don’t know. It could take them a while to address the specific error, they’re working on remodeling the page as well, so they may just not fix it until the remodel.

item.title: Fix the status page!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It’s being worked on:

[8/31/2013 12:31:52 PM] Sk8rdude: Fix the SSP [8/31/2013 12:33:02 PM] Si Force: working on it ;) [8/31/2013 12:33:10 PM] Sk8rdude: :D [8/31/2013 12:33:20 PM] Si Force: assuming you're referring about the spamming [8/31/2013 12:33:20 PM] Sk8rdude: Like 5 people complained "my server won't show up" [8/31/2013 12:33:24 PM] Sk8rdude: No [8/31/2013 12:33:27 PM] Si Force: oh [8/31/2013 12:33:37 PM] Sk8rdude: People's servers haven't been added since the 25th [8/31/2013 12:34:00 PM] Sk8rdude: Refer to: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,647815.0.html [8/31/2013 12:35:44 PM] Si Force: just told Tom [8/31/2013 12:35:52 PM] Si Force: we didn't know there was a problem with that [8/31/2013 12:36:09 PM] Sk8rdude: I was like "I can't do much but say it's broken" lol [8/31/2013 12:37:39 PM] Si Force: heh, fair enough [8/31/2013 12:37:47 PM] Si Force: thanks for telling us, hopefully we'll get that fixed ASAP

Read full topic
